**Which feature are you providing feedback on?**
Please specify the name or area of the feature.

**What do you like about it?**
Let us know what works well for you.

**What could be improved?**
Describe any friction points, missing capabilities, or confusing aspects.

**Additional comments**
Add any other context or suggestions here.
